extension.name: yoo_intro
extension.author: YOOtheme
extension.description: Intro is the March 2010 theme of the YOOtheme club. It is based on YOOtheme's Warp CMS theme framework. NOTE: It is not free or public. This theme is for members of the YOOtheme club only.

field.name: template_width_unit
field.label: Template Width Unit
field.description: Set the template width length unit to pixel or percent. For example use 90% to get a fluid layout.

field.name: compression
field.label: Compression
field.description: Select the compression mode: Minify and combine templates css and javascript into a single file. Compress these files with gzip. Use Data URIs instead of images to remove all image file requests.

field.name: verify
field.label: Verify Files
field.description: Detects and shows all template file modifications

field.name: left_width
field.label: Left Width
field.description: Set the width of the #left column in pixels. Don't forget to modify existent background images to match the new width if needed.

field.name: left_space
field.label: Left Space
field.description: Set the space between the #left and #main column in pixels.

field.name: right_width
field.label: Right Width
field.description: Set the width of the #right column in pixels. Don't forget to modify existent background images to match the new width if needed.

field.name: right_space
field.label: Right Space
field.description: Set the space between the #main and #right column in pixels.

field.name: contentleft_width
field.label: Contentleft Width
field.description: Set the width of the #contentleft column in pixels. Don't forget to modify existent background images to match the new width if needed.

field.name: contentleft_space
field.label: Contentleft Space
field.description: Set the space between the #contentleft and #content column in pixels.

field.name: contentright_width
field.label: Contentright Width
field.description: Set the width of the #contentright column in pixels. Don't forget to modify existent background images to match the new width if needed.

field.name: contentright_space
field.label: Contentright Space
field.description: Set the space between the #content and #contentright column in pixels.

field.name: menu_width
field.label: Drop Down Column Width
field.description: Set the width of one column of the drop down menu in pixels.
